MetaFeaturesRegression¶

class pymeta.meta_learning.MetaFeaturesRegression(dataset_name: str = 'None', random_state: int = None, metric: str = 'mae', ignore_categorical: bool = False, normalize: bool = True, correlation_method: str = 'spearman', n_jobs: int = None, coef_threshold: float = 0.5, categorical_mask: list = None, distance_metric: str = 'euclidean')¶

Bases: pymeta.meta_learning.qualities.BaseMeta

Build meta features for regression tasks.

Methods Summary

fit(X, y)

Call meta features calculation and store it.

qualities([result])

Get fitted metafeatures.

Methods Documentation

fit(X: numpy.array, y: numpy.array)¶

Call meta features calculation and store it.

Parameters

  • X (numpy.array) – 2D array with features columns

  • y (numpy.array) – Array of true values

Returns

MetaFeatures object with params calculated

Return type

object

qualities(result: str = 'DataFrame') → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

Get fitted metafeatures.

Parameters

Returns
